5. Storage: please answer the first sub question (where will the data be stored)
6. Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy expects 10 years of data preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy) 
7. Sharing: Have you considered using a data repository for preservation and sharing? If there are disciplinary repositories in your field depositing here increases the findability and reusability of your work. For data for which there is no domain specific repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
